text.content: Push algorithm

r', q' = r, q
r'[u] = r[u] + (1-beta)q[u]
q'[u] = beta * q[u] / 2
for v in u->v:
	q'[v] = q[v] + beta * q[u] / (2 * d[u])
return r', q'

rich_text.plain_text:
r', q' = r, q
r'[u] = r[u] + (1-beta)q[u]
q'[u] = beta * q[u] / 2
for v in u->v:
	q'[v] = q[v] + beta * q[u] / (2 * d[u])
return r', q'
